fuse

Class PasswordEntry

  • java.lang.Object
    • fuse.util.Struct
      • fuse.PasswordEntry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class PasswordEntry
extends Struct
    Looks up a password entry by username or userid.

    This is necessary in order to map remote users to local user when the remote system has different uid's to the local system or when the remote system does not provide uid's.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int gid
      Primary group (gid) of the user.
      java.lang.String homeDirectory
      Home directory based on /etc/passwd.
      java.lang.String shell
      Login shell, based on /etc/passwd.
      int uid
      Numeric user id.
      java.lang.String username
      Short username (jsmith) not real name (John Smith).

      • lookupByUsername

        public static PasswordEntry lookupByUsername(java.nio.charset.Charset cs,
                             java.lang.String username)
        Lookup a users password entry based on the given username.
        Parameters:
        cs - character set used to map strings.
        username - the username to lookup
        Returns:
        the password entry or null if an error (not found) occurs.
